short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the Modern Search extension to search directly from a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Modern Search is a browser extension that provides users with a feature to search directly from new tab. With a modern design it gives an ability to change the background so you wonâ€™t be bored.

Also it allows users to quickly and easily access to their most visited sites, check the weather information and use modern clocks. Extension can be customised to suit user preferences.

"By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Modern Search extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
The Modern Search extension replaces your New Tab search engine and provides a new search experience with search results by Microsoft Bing.

Terms of Use: https://modern-search.com/pages/terms
Privacy Policy: https://modern-search.com/pages/policy

For more information please visit: https://modern-search.com/
Enjoy and please don't forget to  leave us a 5 start review!
